timeline.bodyText:
There are 3 services in UserRegistrationServer, so we probably need 3 entries here:
/myStudiesConsentMgmtWS/* (/ping for healthcheck)
/myStudiesEnrollmentMgmt/* (/ping for healthcheck)
/myStudiesUserMgmtWS/* (/healthCheck for healthcheck)
I haven't figured out a way to configure the readinessProbe for all 3 services so I'm assuming that one is healthy means all are healthy (which might not always be true).
timeline.author: kuoyuchi
timeline.diffHunk:
@@ -13,3 +13,15 @@ spec:
             backend:
               serviceName: auth-server-np
               servicePort: 50000
+          - path: /mystudies-response-server/*
+            backend:
+              serviceName: response-server-np
+              servicePort: 50000
+          - path: /myStudiesUserMgmtWS/*
+            backend:
+              serviceName: user-registration-server-np
+              servicePort: 50000

timeline.message: Add the other two services in user registration server to the ingress.
